import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function Company(){ const [refresh , setRefresh] = useState(false); const [societa , setSocieta] = useState([]); const loading = () =>{ setRefresh(prev => !prev) } useEffect(()=>{ fetch('api/companies/') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setSocieta(data)) .catch(err => setSocieta([])) },[]) return(
{ Array.isArray(societa) && societa.map(societa =>( ))}
ID SOCIETA NOME SOCIETA CITTA PAESE
{societa.id_societa} {societa.nome_societa} {societa.citta} {societa.paese}
); } export default Company
